dmca.title: Wal-Mart Puts a High Price on Parody
dmca.body:
Dear Abuse Department:

We are intellectual property counsel to Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. (Wal-Mart) and the charitable foundation, the Wal-Mart Foundation.  Wal-Mart is the world's largest retailer, and the funding and activities of the Wal-Mart Foundation are significant.

The Wal-Mart Foundation operates a website found at www.walmartfoundation.org.  A copy of representative pages of that website is attached as Exhibit 1.  Your customer has registered www.walmart-foundation.org and has copied significant amounts of content and graphics from our client's websites.  See Exhibit 2.  For example, your customer's site exactly reproduces the graphics and content of the banner across the top of our client
